Description: Leaf-shaped fragment of bread, broken. It contains whole barley grains and chaff, as well as pulp of the fruit of Christ's thorn (Ziziphus spina-christi).
Bibliographic references: Cartwright and Taylor 2015 / Ancient Egyptian funerary food: new insights (p.98, table.1, p.103, p.105)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2014, 22 Apr-30 Nov, London, BM.
